server

Interface ServerInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MockServerProxy, ServerProxy

    public interface ServerInterface
    Server Interface is implemented by Server Proxy and MockServerProxy in order to interact with actual Server on each method the ServerInterface will call the Translator to serialize components into JSON to send to server

        Parameters:
        playerID - ID of player sending trade
        resourceGive - resouces offered
        resourceReceive - resources to get from receiver
        receiverID - ID of player being offered trade

               boolean accept)
                 throws ServerException

        Parameters:
        playerID - ID of player accepting or rejecting trade
        accept - True if player accepted trade

        ServerException

      • maritimeTrade

        void maritimeTrade(int playerID,
                 int ratio,
                 ResourceType inputResource,
                 ResourceType outputResource)
                   throws ServerException
        Used to execute trades involving ports
        Parameters:
        playerID - ID of player trading
        ratio - Ratio of trade(ie for 3:1 the value of ratio would be 3)
        inputResource - Resource player gives
        outputResource - Resource player receives
        Throws:
        ServerException
